website_summaries.verdict: Classic trouser socks with knee-high length that offer a comfortable fit and stylish appearance.
pros: Made of a nylon and spandex blend that's comfortable and has an attractive finish
Choice of several popular, neutral colors
cons: Rare reports of them not staying up all day
May show signs of wear after several washings - hand washing is recommended

customer_reviews.title: The fit has changed & not for the good.
customer_reviews.text: I run and I swim. I have muscles in my legs. I have worn and loved Hue Plus Size Trouser Socks for years. Something has happened. They now are very tight at the top. I have actually lost weight so you would think they would fit better. They do not. They are no longer comfortable. I had them a while before I wore them so it was too late to return them. I am going to have to look for another brand of socks. Very disappointed. If you order, make sure you try them on as soon as you get them.
customer_reviews.author: BayleighTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I had boots that barely fit so I needed something ultra thin that would last longer than pantyhose. I've washed these in the washer and dried them like regular socks and they hold up A+. They havnt faded, snagged or lost shape.
customer_reviews.author: M_NYC

customer_reviews.title: great fit for large calves.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only knee hi's I can wear that don't bind. And they wear well, retaining their stretch after washing. Been using them for several years. (Not the same pair). Originally saw them in a store, where I was told the size only applied to feet (like size 11-12) but in fact, they are more like a Queen size. And did I mention, they don't bind or cut off circulation, AND they stay up!
customer_reviews.author: Olia

customer_reviews.title: They Stay Up
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I had never purchased Hue products before I bought these socks, so I was pleasantly surprised to find them to be an excellent response to my "thin socks" Amazon search. They stay up--which is one of the main things requested of socks. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit really well, and best of all, they stay up all day without cutting off my circulation. I bought a 3-pack a year ago and they're still in great shape, so I ordered more in black. Only wish they had more colors!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Knee highs, not socks
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin - like knee highs, not at all like socks. And they slide down.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trouser sock
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 10. These have a perfect fit. Great for wear with boots or any closed-toe shoe. Also I am probably 10-15 lbs overweight and these are not too tight around my calves, like some trouser socks are. But they stay up, so they're but too loose either. Update: I was disappointed when I put on a pair today and found after apwearing them only a few times that one had a run in it at the toe seam. I hope that was just a fluke and the other two pair will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these for 4 hours, they teared and fell apart. Returned immediately. Unexpected and disappointing from this , not exactly cheap, brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leissner

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Hue trouser socks for many years. These are not of the quality as the ones I've worn in the past. They are very thin - think of thick panty hose, and a bit see-through at the toes. They are also not durable, lint pills form on these socks. The only positive is that they do stay up!
customer_reviews.author: K. P.

customer_reviews.title: unable to submit without selecting a star when no stars were earned
customer_reviews.text: original order for set of three pairs of socks contained 5 socks (should be 6 as any kindergartener knows there are two socks in a pair) and the length of each sock in one pair did match each other. unable to keep the one pair that was ok. replacement was 6 socks but all of them were different lengths so still nothing to keep
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These opaque knee hi’s stay up without tugging. They don’t shrink even when thrown into the dryer. Plus they’re very difficult to run. Well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper21043

customer_reviews.title: happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Well made. Silky feel. Trustworthy elastic. Go all the way up to my knee (not always the case with me and trouser socks.) I've loved the Hue socks. These are every bit as good.
customer_reviews.author: serious java

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks - they stay up
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks - they stay up, and they're comfortable. Also, they last a couple of years before the elastic wears out. And, unlike "regular" socks, they don't shrink when they're washed.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I hoped they would be. Thicker than hose but not as thick as socks. They are perfect for under pants with my nicer shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just the right weight and colors that I needed for upcoming cooler weather. Are well-made and seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: CharCzar

customer_reviews.title: Solution for long, full legs XL
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Got XL. I am tall with a full leg. Always the bands were too tight or slipped down. This has a flat 1 inch band on top. Good for winter wear as another layer under other socks. The weight is like a strong nylon that does not snag easily. 'Great for trousers except in summer
customer_reviews.author: Karen Norman

customer_reviews.title: DID I LIKE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THE TROUSER SOCKS FIT ME VERY WELL...IF I'D BEEN ANY BIGGER THOUGH THEY WOULDN'T HAVE..MY SHOE SIZE IS 10W AND THEY FIT WELL AND CAME ALL THE WAY UP TO MY KNEE...I'M NOT A THIN PERSON EITHER AND THEY WEREN'T TIGHT AROUND MY CALF AT ALL.....I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM TO ANYONE LOOKING FOR A GOOD, COMFOTYABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT TROUSER SOCK
customer_reviews.author: V. McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Fit great for wide calf
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they fit great. I have about a 16" calf so need wide boots just do you can compare. No issues so far with these trouser socks. I just ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: JCinVA

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Already bought another three-pack. Wish they came in other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Comfy, like a second skin!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fit, wear, and texture. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M.

customer_reviews.title: These are my new go-to for trouser socks. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go-to for trouser socks. I didn't want heavy/thick socks. These are smooth and almost sleek looking. They stay up without constant tugging (my calves are on the medium size) and have withstood several washes so far. Will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice silky feel to them. They stay up well but they don't bind. I'm very happy with these trouser socks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Like a knee hi
customer_reviews.text: More like a knee hi than a trouser sock. Well made & good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am not hugely fat, but have heavy calves and knees, and usually knee socks just slide off. These fit perfectly, stay up all day, and have a great feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: OnTopic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I finally had to admit I'd gained enough weight to move up to to X-Large hosiery. Delivery was prompt and the socks were in good condition. The trouser socks looked and felt good. Glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable without being too tight at the top, even after multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit. The wide band is nonbinding and stays in place. Just wish that there was more of a color selection..
customer_reviews.author: Terry "Island Girl"

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hue's socks usually don't disappoint and these are no exception.
customer_reviews.author: fotogal

customer_reviews.title: Added to much spandex
customer_reviews.text: Worn these for years. Wear everyday. I have to find another brand now. They have added so much spandex I cannot wear any longer. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: irish realtor

customer_reviews.title: I love these Trouser Socks!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these trouser socks-you just can't imagine! They fit comfortable, the don't fall down during the day and they don't pinch by calfs. Just wonderful! I am going to order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fits great, stays up and is very comfortable. I wear them with my slacks to work and in bad NJ weather they work well in my rain/snow boots that have a lining for warmth and slip off very easy once I get to work and put on my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Ilhwa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: of all the trouser socks Hues makes the most comfortable and the best
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE TROUSER SOCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS SEARCHING FOR BLACK TROUSER SOCKS IN A KNEE HIGH. THESE ARE PERFECT, FIT GREAT, AND THE PRICE WAS RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: JEAN14

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They stay up without binding under the knee. Good colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: These are just right in weight and fit perfect. I took a size 1 as I am small and wear a size 6.5 shoe. I did not hand wash them. I put them in with delicates and they came out well.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritualOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: they last a long time. You can wash them repeatedly with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: st.jude3

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great - fit is good, they stay up and have held up well over the past few months. These will be my 'go-to' socks from now on!
customer_reviews.author: grdnrgal

customer_reviews.title: Knee Highs Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, but since I'm short, it's s but longer than I would have liked. For most people it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mickala

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trouser Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these socks. They're lightweight, comfortable & fit well. The band at the top of the hose is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JDenise

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and they have an elegant look
customer_reviews.text: The stockings fit very well. They are comfortable and they have an elegant look.
customer_reviews.author: Jaboticaba

customer_reviews.title: trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: These trouser socks are really nice. Nice smooth fit and are just what I hoped for. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: T. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Can be great dress socks for men
customer_reviews.text: I think these make great dress socks for men as well. The level of opacity is just right; they're light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Albert JP

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and incredibly comfortable. These don't snag easily and are perfect for work. I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Me23

customer_reviews.title: colors and sizes are good so good as trouser
customer_reviews.text: feel soft, not too transparent, band is not too tight, colors and sizes are good so good as trouser socks
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, stay up really well
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, stay up really well. I have large calves and purchased the larger size and I am so pleased with the fit. There is nothing worse that socks slipping down all day long!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Valenstein

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except they fit well and seem to be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Randy Nance

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow band
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow at the top and left me w welts under my knees
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit in good colors!  Three or four stars.
customer_reviews.text: I like trouser socks and Hue is a brand of passable quality.
customer_reviews.author: eliza hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her Christmas present. Fit well and stay up and are right thickness. What more can you expect?
customer_reviews.author: James E. Clark III

customer_reviews.title: These socks are the best thin trouser socks that I have been able to ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks are the best thin trouser socks that I have been able to find on Amazon. They are however a little long for me (I am 5'4"). If only the company made the same socks in ankle length!
customer_reviews.author: chic

customer_reviews.title: Best trouser sock
customer_reviews.text: Sheer, light and stays in place. Ordered 9 more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Parks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They stay up. They wash well and last a long time
customer_reviews.author: CDAZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dress Socks
customer_reviews.text: Stay up all day. Launder well. Love the fact the go up to the knee. This are a winter go to for me.
customer_reviews.author: mzplacedinphl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, good fit and great quality. I am so pleased. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Hue Trouser Socks
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as expected and what I wanted. Have only worn them twice so cannot address durability. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WJB

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with quality and softness of product. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne james

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight socks.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Hue Opaque Trouser socks for over 15 years. These socks are light weight but sturdy even after being washed many times. They hold their shape and do not slip down. Only wish they still made more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice trouser sock
customer_reviews.text: Trouser sock fits very nicely. Material is high quality. Toe is not reinforced, though, which was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MD Mom

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them! I have a hard time finding these ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! I have a hard time finding these to fit and these are exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The binding around the top of the sock is tighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best I've found
customer_reviews.text: Generous length. I'm only 5'7'' but have a hard time finding socks that come up to my knees. These are the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: k. s. l.

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect for me. They even provide some support, and I've gotten compliments on how attractive they are. (How often do trouser socks get compliments?) Nice, rich colors, too. Excellent all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jo's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Came today and I have a pair on now. Absolutely perfect for me. I am only 5' tall but they come just below my knee perfectly and fit great around my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great fit just the right length, good quality very satisfied with the overall purchase, would recommend and buy again in the future
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Found some good socks.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for exactly this kind of socks and was delighted to find these; immediately ordered another set. They are heavy enough to last for a while, but feel nice on my feet. They aren't too thick or too thin, and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: A Texas Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Not "socks" but very expensive knee highs
customer_reviews.text: Not "socks" but very expensive knee highs without reinforced toes.
customer_reviews.author: ignaz60

customer_reviews.title: Hue socks
customer_reviews.text: They aren't socks in my opinion. They are knee high stockings. These are thin like stockings and I wanted a thin sock.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: I got these socks for a Christmas gift and the recipient is very happy with the fit and look of them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I went to stores and none had these! So nice to get high quality knee hi's for loafers and flat heel shoes!
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very small feet and bigger calves. Need a more customized fit.
customer_reviews.author: lgroux

product_meta.title: Hue Women's 3 Pair Pack Opaque Trouser Sock
